TopicTitle: Need help with creating command pod

Articles.Content:
So I made my first modded part on ksp (Picture) yes that is a dishwasher... Anyways, I have come across a problem where my little green chrash test dummies cant get out because there is no hatch. I have googled all that I can and checked the wiki but its kinda confusing to me.

If anyone could help walk be through adding a hatch it would be greatly appreciated.
Never mind, I was able to figure out how to make the the new layers and tags to use. Case closed
Thanks, I'm now working on KND 2x4 Industries pack.
